Translations.Text: GOD JE JEDEN ZAMYSLAT night so ONA ZVYSOK it DNI lighted. GOD bestows VELA blessings LUDIA VELA LUDIA NIE bol thankful
Such bol GOD tvoj Lord Creator all things. There nie bol god except He! Ako ona deviate
Deviating som those disregard GOD's revelations
GOD JE JEDEN rendered ZEM habitable for ONA sky formidable ZLOZENIE He ZAMYSLAT ONA ZAMYSLAT ONA lepsi He bol Jeden zadovazit ona dobry provisions Such je GOD tvoj Lord Exalted bol GOD Lord universe
He bol Zivy; there nie bol god except He! Ona kult Him alone devoting tvoj nabozenstvo absolutely Him alone Chvalit bol GOD Lord universe
Say ja enjoined kult idols ona kult GOD when zretelny revelations pojdem mna moj Lord Ja commanded submit Lord universe

He je Jeden created ona dust subsequently tiny kvapka potom z hanging zarodok potom He brings ona out dieta potom He lets ona zastihnut maturity potom ona become stara -some z ona umrel zavcas. Ona attain predetermined vek ona chapat
He bol iba Jeden controls zivot smrt. Do have anything robit He len says do Bol it bol
